episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4001_1001_03:
We’re helping the Aether Foundation and folks
on Pasio come together for an Ultra Beast meet-
and-greet...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4001_1001_04: And we were hoping you could also help out!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4001_1001_05:
With all the incidents on Pasio lately, and all these
UBs appearing...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4001_1001_06:
we thought that it’d be nice if more people could
get along with Ultra Beasts!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4001_0401_08:
Right?! Let’s get everyone to learn more about
UBs!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4001_1001_11:
By the way, these aren’t sygna suits we’re
wearing...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4001_1001_12:
But we’re hoping that these new outfits show our
dedication to making more UB fans!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4001_1001_13: It’s a change of pace, y’know?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4001_1001_14:
We’re gonna hold that meet-and-greet in town!
Come on, let’s go!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/6801_1001_01:
Going on adventures and battling with Ultra Beasts
is really exciting!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/6801_1001_02: Let’s go full power and ULTRA enjoy every day!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_03:
Doesn’t it produce a strong neurotoxin, though? Is
it safe?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_04:
I heard that someone got infested by it and
suddenly became violent...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_06:
(I guess I shouldn’t have expected this to be
easy...)
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_07:
There were people who showed some interest in
Ultra Beasts...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_08:
but there were also quite a few who were having
trouble accepting them.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_09:
That’s understandable... I think some people are
just scared of how powerful they are.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_10: I mean...UBs can be scary, sure.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_11: But can’t we say that about other Pokémon, too?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_12:
Think of any Legendary Pokémon—like the tapu,
for example!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_13:
They’re REALLY powerful, but we can still be
friends with them!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_14:
Considering that, you’d think there’d be more
acceptance of UBs...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_15:
Maybe it’s because Ultra Beasts look so strange
and different.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_17:
If only we could get people to understand how
much fun it is know the unknown...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4002_1001_21:
You know what? Come with me! I just thought of
some people I want to show the UBs to!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_02:
What unique Pokémon! I wonder what kind of lives
they lead!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_03: Um... So you’re not scared of them?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_04: Well... I’d be lying if I said I wasn’t.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_05:
But these Pokémon being Ultra Beasts doesn’t make
them any scarier than usual, I think.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_06:
If you don’t know what makes a Pokémon
dangerous, then you need to survey it more!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_0301_07: Spoken like a Survey Corps member!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_0402_10: You and I were thinking the same thing, Akari.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_12:
So this is what you were talking about before,
Elio?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_14: The last time I hung out with Rei, we talked a lot.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_15:
He mentioned that there were a lot of things
about Pokémon that were still unknown back
in the times of Hisui.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_16:
In other words, the Pokémon that we consider
ordinary now were like UBs to the people of
Hisui—dangerous, mysterious creatures.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_17:
People are used to Pokémon in this era, but I
guess in the end, that core fear is still the same.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_18:
At first, I was scared of Pokémon that could
create electricity or fire, especially since I didn’t
understand them.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_19:
It took a while to build a relationship with them
until they became partners I could trust.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_20:
Um... As a member of the Survey Corps, I wanted
to ask...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_21:
These UBs are from a different world, right? Can
you catch them with Poké Balls?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_23: You can, but it’s pretty difficult.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_24:
So difficult, in fact, that the Aether Foundation
actually developed a special type of Poké Ball
called a Beast Ball.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_25:
Beast Balls make it easier to catch UBs, but
they don’t work well on other Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_27:
But they can only be produced in small amounts
and can’t be found in regular stores, so not too
many people know about them.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_28:
Maybe that’s one of the reasons why people find
it hard to get closer to UBs?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_29:
Even in Hisui, Poké Balls weren’t widespread, so
Pokémon wielders were rare.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_30:
Maybe once Beast Balls are widely available,
more Trainers could partner up with UBs. That
could change some minds!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_31: But we can’t just sit and wait for that to happen!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_32:
I’m sure we can do what we did in Hisui when
we would share the info we gathered from our
surveys...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_33:
We can survey UBs, too, and introduce them to
even more people!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_34:
The way people and Pokémon coexist has
evolved over time.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_35:
In Hisui, people started having Pokémon help with
tasks and work, which let humans become more
familiar with them.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_36:
I think this is a chance for us to start changing the
way we coexist with UBs, too!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_37:
Let’s keep convincing more people to join us!
I’ll help you!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_38:
After all, if these UBs are Pokémon from another
world... I can relate to that on a personal level.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_39:
I’ll help you, too! I have some experience with
overcoming the fear of Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_41: I’m so glad I asked you two for advice!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4003_1001_42:
Now that we have some reliable friends helping
us out, let’s head back into town!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_02: This is my partner Pokémon, Nihilego!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_03:
Sometimes, its movements and gestures make it
look like a little girl!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_05:
So you know what I did? I decided to find some
common ground and look for things it might like!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_06:
We went to a lot of different shops and stopped
at some cafés...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_07:
And guess what I learned! This Nihilego really
loves cute clothes and sweets!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_08: Oooh, I love cute clothes and sweets too!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_09:
I don’t think it understands human speech, but
it really seems to be enjoying itself!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_10: That’s friend material right there, don’t you think?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_12:
It can be intimidating when it’s aggressive, but
it’s usually super calm.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_13:
When it stands still like that, it really does look
just like a wall...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_14:
Yeah, it seems to prefer just standing around
instead of being really active.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_16: So it’s quiet, then...just like my Nosepass!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_17:
Do you have any other interesting stories about
UBs?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4004_1001_21:
Then, let’s have the Aether Foundation bring
them out!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_03: The meet-and-greet was a huge success!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_04: I also got an idea for my next goal!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_07: One day, I wanna battle with Nihilego onstage!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_08:
We can team up with the Masked Royal...with
Brycen-Man and Bellelba as our opponents!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_09:
If Nihilego can play the hero, I’m sure it’ll become
more approachable!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_10:
I like that! That’ll be a great performance to
watch, for sure.
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_11: What should I strive for with Stakataka...?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_12:
Hmm... Well, I can’t think of anything big like you,
Selene...
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_13:
But I’d like to go on an adventure with Stakataka
and visit all sorts of places!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_14:
Together, we’ll explore the unknown and see
new sights!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_0301_15: I’m sure your dreams will come true!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_0401_16: Yeah! I’ll do my best to make it happen!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_0401_17:
It’ll be a race to see who can make their dream
come true first!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_0402_20:
I’ll tell you all about my adventures with
Stakataka, OK, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_21: Hm? You want us to...turn around?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_24: Looks like their meet-and-greet did well too!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_25: Yeah! Everyone seems to be having fun!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_26:
A whole bunch of people on Pasio have formed
sync pairs with UBs, huh?
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_27:
Any Pokémon, UB or not, has the potential to
become the best partner ever!
episode_event_ch0123_ch0122/4005_1001_28: That’s what I’m starting to think!
